name: Asesores comunitarios, S.L
goal: International Consultancy specialised in lobbying, EU law, European and UN affairs. With 30 years of presence in Brussels, the company advises/represents the interests of large companies and associations from Europe, Brazil, China, Russia, Canada, India operating in different sectors: agri-food, energy, transport and building materials. The company concentrates its activity in the EU institutions and UN Organizations based in Geneva.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: All EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related transport, energy, agro-food and building materials.
